|rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== aka the Rosewill RNX-N4 (Rosewill is a Newegg brand) "7016A0141000" is silkscreened on the board. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.senao.com/Taiwan/Default.aspx?TYPE=vipplayercard.htm&PT=product_t3&tv_TCAT_POS=0&PID=02020007&CATNO0=B&CATNO1=B22&CNT=1 RAM and Flash noted on Senao website]
